attributes.action: Reject the proposed law banning the sale of Samurai Swords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new proposed law banning the sale and importing of samurai swords is both poorly thought out and a waste of time.

Nearly all Samurai swords purchased in the UK are by collectors for decorational reasons or martial artists. Attacks on people are so rare this ban would be utterly innefective at saving lives. The attacks which have happened would still have gone ahead with some other sharp household item used in lue of a sword had one not been available.

This law would be counter productive, would not save lives and would devistate the many businesses which rely on the sale of these items and upset the thousands of collectors in the UK
